definition: to build by laying bricks or stones

sentences.english: In this paper, a method for calculating seismic vulnerability matrix of brick masonry structure is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种计算砖砌体结构地震易损性矩阵的方法。

sentences.english: Some specific works are made in load-bearing masonry.
sentences.chinese: 一些具体的部位建立在承重砌体基础上。
砌体暗渠取代混凝土排水沟。

sentences.english: Masonry structure is a type of traditional structure with wide and many uses.
sentences.chinese: 砌体结构在我国是一种应用量大面广的传统结构形式。

sentences.english: The special-shaped block and ordinary concrete block compression test and shear test were conducted.
sentences.chinese: 并设计了混凝土异型砌块砌体的抗震性能试验方案。

sentences.english: Laying should avoid shocked the lower masonry.
sentences.chinese: 砌筑时应避免震惊下层砌体。

sentences.english: The earthquake -resistant character of high-rise masonry structure with constructing measure has also been analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 还分析了具有构造措施的砌体结构的抗震特性。

sentences.english: In principle , each wedge-shaped masonry block cannot fall inward without pushing the others out ;
sentences.chinese: 砌体块原则，每个楔形砌块无法向内倾圮的。

sentences.english: The results show that the reinforced masonry has good seismic properties.
sentences.chinese: 试验表明组合配筋砖砌体墙片具有较好的抗震性能。

sentences.english: After the completion of the building should be well maintenance, keep wet surface masonry.
sentences.chinese: 砌筑完毕后应做好养护，保持砌体表面潮湿。

sentences.english: Through experiments, the shear strength of concrete hollow brick masonry has been researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 通过试验研究了混凝土空心砖砌体的抗剪强度。

sentences.english: The flexural tensile strength of perforated concrete brick masonry is studied by experiment.
sentences.chinese: 通过试验研究了混凝土多孔砖砌体的弯曲抗拉强度。

sentences.english: It can be reference for the design of multi-story masonry buildings.
sentences.chinese: 希望有益于多层砌体房屋设计的改进。

sentences.english: Masonry structures serve outdoor kitchen facilities and pool environments.
sentences.chinese: 砌体结构为户外厨房设施和游泳池环境。

sentences.english: The results show that the aseismic behavior of reinforced masonry is good.
sentences.chinese: 试验表明配筋砌体房屋有良好的抗震性能。

sentences.english: This is a dry-masonry structure with a friction-resistant stress-transfer mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种具有抗摩擦应力转移机制的无浆砌体。

definition: to plaster/to render (a wall)/(fig.) to bring shame on/also pr. [mo4 hui1]
floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
roof/roof plate/rock layer forming roof of a cave or mine/abacus
